name: King of Queendoms
description: King of Queendoms is a comedic adult visual novel set in a magical fantasy land. Play as a knight quested to bring order and peace to the rising political and diplomatic tensions across the lands.
minimum_requirements: OS: Vista or higher Processor: 1Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Vista or higher Processor: 2Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
